text: Boydton is a town in the U.S. state of Virginia. It is the county seat of Mecklenburg County. ==Notable people== * Mark Alexander (1792–1883), born near Boydton, United States Congressman from Virginia * William A. Burwell (1780–1821), born near Boydton, State Congressman and United States Congressman from Virginia, private secretary for President Thomas Jefferson. * Henry Johnson (1850–1904) born in Boydton, Buffalo Soldier, US Army, Medal of Honor recipient. ==References== Category:Towns in Virginia Category:County seats in Virginia
title: Boydton, Virginia
